name: Artemis Spaceship Bridge Simulator
description: Uses the Artemis installer you get after buying the game from the  official website and then downloads and installs the 2.7.1 patch
content:
files:
- base: N/A:Select game installer
- update: https://artemisspaceshipbridge.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/Artemis_Upgrade_v2_7_1.exe
game:
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Artemis/Artemis.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    args: /S
    executable: base
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /S
    executable: update
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
